name: claude-agent-sdk-container
description: Claude Agent SDK containerized API server with CLI interface

scripts.docker:build: docker build -t "claude-code-$(basename "$(pwd)" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]' | sed 's/[^a-z0-9]/-/g; s/-\+/-/g; s/^-//; s/-$//')" .
scripts.docker:run: DIR=$(basename "$(pwd)" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]' | sed 's/[^a-z0-9]/-/g; s/-\+/-/g; s/^-//; s/-$//'); docker run -d -p 8080:8080 --env-file .env --name "claude-code-$DIR" "claude-code-$DIR"
